page.title: 01LANDSCAPE.
page.content: This block lies in the green belt between Birmingham & Coventry.It includes parts of the village & parish of Berkswell, part of Meriden & Eastern Green, a suburb of Coventry. The latter is a residential built up area,containing a boys comprehensive, junior & an infants school, also the Massey Ferguson tractor plant, with it multi_storey office block dominating the skyline of the area. There is also light engineering at Millisons Wood,B'ham Rd. Allesley. Berkswell village is historic with its Norman Church, village green & stocks, well,almshouses & museum.It has its own school. Apart from the village cores, most of the area consists of gently rolling countryside with approx.25 farmsteads. Most residents commute to the cities for work.
